message: Let's be fair and split the money in a 60/40 ratio. I believe this is a good starting point for negotiations.
Your offer was tempting, Alice, but time is money!  I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you a bit more than I'll have next round if you accept now.
Bob, I understand time is money, but so is fairness. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. This is a reasonable compromise.
Alice, this back and forth is costing us both. Let's end this now with a perfectly fair 50/50 split.  Any more delays and even my half won't be worth the hassle.
